descriptionHtml:
---ADDED NEW OILY-FACE PICTURE---
---Patch 1.2---
Added a way how u can look in your armour oily too check it out

Hi guys ;)
This is NO MOD its just a tutorial how to get a nice oily body. I just wanted an oily body and searched so long and didnt find good things :/
But now i found a nice way follow my steps and enjoy :)
When you download the file u get a ReadmeÂ  and a few pics.

Screenshots:
Max Specular Strenght and Glossiness: (1000)
http://www.bilder-upload.eu/show.php?file=9e9e42-1396878543.jpg
Max Glossiness Specular Strenght=30:
http://www.bilder-upload.eu/show.php?file=6bf7f3-1396878711.jpg

Requirements:

Equipable Wet Female Body Textures
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27593/?
NifSkope
http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope

Recommended Mods:

SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?
Unique Character
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13712/?
BodyChange - A Multi-Bodyshape System
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37546/?


Protip you can preview your body meshes while in-game. Just open game in window mode ( windows mode gives 0 crashes , alt-tabbing is risky ).

- load your game and alt tab to your folders and switch .nif's with newly created body meshes after editing them in the nifskope

- go back into the game ( maximize )

- equip some random armour and uneqiup it right after it loads

- now you can see game that has loaded newly edited mesh , so there is no need to restart Skyrim XX times after each .nif editing. Less time consuming.

Works also with textures , just requip items.
author: AntiYakuza
